# Interface: INativeToken

Native token.

## Table of contents

### Properties

- [id](INativeToken.md#id)
- [amount](INativeToken.md#amount)

## Properties

### id

• **id**: `string`

Identifier of the native token.

---

### amount

• **amount**: `string`

Amount of native tokens of the given Token ID.
